Total time: 35 mins 
 
 Category: Dinner 
 
 Serving Size: 5 
 
 Ingredients:
 8 Potatoes, peeled and quartered 
 1/2 Cup Milk 
 1/4 Cup Butter 
 2 Cloves Garlic, minced 
 Salt to Taste 
 2 Tablespoons Sesame Seeds 
 

Instructions:
 1. Bring a large pot of water to boil 
 2. Add potatoes, and boil until soft, about 20 mins 
 3. Drain, and place in a large bowl 
 4. Combine potatoes with milks, butter, garlic, salt, and pepper 
 5. Mix with electric mixer or potato masher 
 6. Sprinkle with sesame seeds 
 7. Enjoy!
